name: Barking Puzzle
description:
Barking Puzzle is an unusual puzzle platformer in which you have to try on the role of a dog trying to return home. You will have a difficult path: traps, enemies and abysses will await you at every corner, and the exit from the level will open only if you collect all the goodies. Can you find all the goodies and get to the very end?

Features:
- Unusual gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
